verses.verse: For, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and in that <S%H1931><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> when <S%H834><s%> I shall bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%>

I will also gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and will bring them down <S%H3381><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> and will plead <S%H8199><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them there <S%H8033><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> and for my heritage <S%H5159><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they have scattered <S%H6340><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and parted <S%H2505><s%> my land. <S%H776><s%>

And they have cast <S%H3032><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for <S%H413><s%> my people; <S%H5971><s%> and have given <S%H5414><s%> a boy <S%H3206><s%> for a harlot, <S%H2181><s%> and sold <S%H4376><s%> a girl <S%H3207><s%> for wine, <S%H3196><s%> that they might drink. <S%H8354><s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> have ye <S%H859><s%> to do with me, O Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1552><s%> of Philistia? <S%H6429><s%> will ye <S%H859><s%> render <S%H7999><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me a recompense? <S%H1576><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> recompense <S%H1580><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, swiftly <S%H7031><s%> and speedily <S%H4120><s%> will I return <S%H7725><s%> your recompense <S%H1576><s%> upon your own head; <S%H7218><s%>

Because <S%H834><s%> ye have taken <S%H3947><s%> my silver <S%H3701><s%> and my gold, <S%H2091><s%> and have carried <S%H935><s%> into your temples <S%H1964><s%> my goodly <S%H2896><s%> pleasant things: <S%H4261><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> also of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> have ye sold <S%H4376><s%> unto the Greeks, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3125><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye might remove them far <S%H7368><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> their border. <S%H1366><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will raise <S%H5782><s%> them out of <S%H4480><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye have sold <S%H4376><s%> them, and will return <S%H7725><s%> your recompense <S%H1576><s%> upon your own head: <S%H7218><s%>

And I will sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H853><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and they shall sell <S%H4376><s%> them to the Sabeans, <S%H7615><s%> to <S%H413><s%> a people <S%H1471><s%> far off: <S%H7350><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.

Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> ye this <S%H2063><s%> among the Gentiles; <S%H1471><s%> Prepare <S%H6942><s%> war, <S%H4421><s%> wake up <S%H5782><s%> the mighty men, <S%H1368><s%> let all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> draw near; <S%H5066><s%> let them come up: <S%H5927><s%>

Beat <S%H3807><s%> your plowshares <S%H855><s%> into swords, <S%H2719><s%> and your pruning hooks <S%H4211><s%> into spears: <S%H7420><s%> let the weak <S%H2523><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am strong. <S%H1368><s%>

Assemble <S%H5789><s%> yourselves, and come, <S%H935><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and gather yourselves together <S%H6908><s%> round about: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> cause thy mighty ones <S%H1368><s%> to come down, <S%H5181><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Let the heathen <S%H1471><s%> be wakened, <S%H5782><s%> and come up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jehoshaphat: <S%H3092><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> will I sit <S%H3427><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> round about. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%>

Put <S%H7971><s%> ye in the sickle, <S%H4038><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> is ripe: <S%H1310><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> get you down; <S%H3381><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the press <S%H1660><s%> is full, <S%H4390><s%> the fats <S%H3342><s%> overflow; <S%H7783><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is great. <S%H7227><s%>

Multitudes, <S%H1995><s%> multitudes <S%H1995><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision: <S%H2742><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision. <S%H2742><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> shall be darkened, <S%H6937><s%> and the stars <S%H3556><s%> shall withdraw <S%H622><s%> their shining. <S%H5051><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> also shall roar <S%H7580><s%> out of Zion, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6726><s%> and utter <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> from Jerusalem; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3389><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall shake: <S%H7493><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will be the hope <S%H4268><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> and the strength <S%H4581><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

So shall ye know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> dwelling <S%H7931><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain: <S%H2022><s%> then shall Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> and there shall no <S%H3808><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> pass through <S%H5674><s%> her any more. <S%H5750><s%>

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall drop down <S%H5197><s%> new wine, <S%H6071><s%> and the hills <S%H1389><s%> shall flow <S%H1980><s%> with milk, <S%H2461><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the rivers <S%H650><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall flow <S%H1980><s%> with waters, <S%H4325><s%> and a fountain <S%H4599><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and shall water <S%H8248><s%> <S%H853><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Shittim. <S%H7851><s%>

Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and Edom <S%H123><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a desolate <S%H8077><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> the violence <S%H2555><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they have shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in their land. <S%H776><s%>
But Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>
For I will cleanse <S%H5352><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> that I have not <S%H3808><s%> cleansed: <S%H5352><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> in Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
